msg: Fixed issue: DIRMINA-406 (ProtocolDecoder.dispose() is called for every read.)

author: trustin
msg: Fixed DIRMINA-405 (IoSession.suspendRead() doesn't suspend read operation immediately when ProtocolCodecFilter is used.)
* Changed SimpleProtocolDecoderOut not to flush messages if trafficMask is set to unreadable
